page.title: 19My nanny
page.content: My nan lives alone with a cat for company. On sunday mornings she goes to church and in the afternoon my uncle trever comes to do the garden for her. She is a member of the Jubilee club for older people who meet on the third tuesday afternoon in each month. Sometimes they have a bring and buy for funds or go out on trip. She does all her shopping in Newport once a week as there ins't a village shop in Childs Ercall, although there is a post office for collecting her pension. She is also a member of the mother's union who meet on a thursday afternoon once a month in the vicarage. They occasionally go to other local mother union meetings or church services. She cleans the church brasses once aweek or once a fortnight depending on how damp the atmosphere is.
